attributes.action: Release the Prisoners, of the Summer 2024 immigration protests
attributes.additional_details: We disagree with the authoritarian government led by Keir Starmer
attributes.background: The people who were unfairly sentenced, in order for the weak Prime Minister to try and show some sort of strength must be released immediately as their trials and sentencing were prejudiced by the Home Secretary and the sentencing was handed out heavily in order to frighten the public.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do. 

Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.
